functionDescription: This function creates a long string object in Lua. It calculates the total size needed for the string, creates the string object, sets its length and content, and marks it as a regular long string.

inputInterfaces.name: l
inputInterfaces.meaning: Length of the long string to be created.

outputInterfaces.name: ts
outputInterfaces.meaning: Pointer to the created long string object.

outputInterfaces.name: ret
outputInterfaces.meaning: Return pointer to the created long string object.

inoutInterfaces.name: L
inoutInterfaces.meaning: The Lua state in which the string is created.
